text: Kunja Bojji (10 February 1926 – 12 April 2021) was an Indian politician belonging to the Communist Party of India (Marxist). He represented the Bhadrachalam seat in the Andhra Pradesh Legislative Assembly between 1985 and 1999.The Hindu. This three-time MLA doesn’t have a houseElection Commission of India. 274 - Bhadrachalam (ST) Assembly Constituency He belonged to the Koya community. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Indian communist politicians Category:Politicians from Andhra Pradesh
title: Kunja Bojji
